title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Setting limits is required when those around you test your boundaries. You cant fault anyone for trying to cross the line when people are often too hooked into their own needs to think about yours. Be clear about your priorities; you only have yourself to blame if youre not pushing back when things grow out of hand. You can thank strict Saturn for turning direct in your 7th House of Companions today, shining a light on where you must assert your edges. Otherwise, you could run yourself ragged placating others with little time left over to pursue your dreams. Claim your power and stand your ground. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
